src_original: buddhaiśca bodhisattvaiśca pañcakāmaguṇairapi ||  pūjitaṁ paśyate bimbaṁ mahājñānasamaprabham || 122 ||
dārakaṁ dārikāṁ paśyan sa siddhimadhigacchati || 125 ||  daśadiksarvabuddhānāṁ kṣetrasthaṁ paśyati dhruvam |

prīṇayanti darśanena lokadhātuṁ samantataḥ || 87 ||  buddhabodhikaraṁ śreṣṭhaṁ buddhavajraprabhāvitam || 88 ||  ityāha bhagavān sarvāśāparipūrakavajraḥ |  -100- atha bhagavān vajrapāṇiḥ sarvatathāgatādhipatiḥ sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittavajravidyāvratasamādānacaryaṁ svakāyavākcittavajrebhyo niścārayāmāsa
jaṭāmukuṭadharaṁ bimbaṁ sitavarṇanibhaṁ mahat |  ṣoḍaśābdikāṁ gṛhya sarvālaṅkārabhūṣitām |
